title: Gus Speth: The US Federal Government‘s Fifty-Year Role in Causing the Climate Crisis
itunes:title: Gus Speth: The US Federal Government‘s Fifty-Year Role in Causing the Climate Crisis
description: From LBJ to the present, the federal government has knowingly continued to expand the US fossil economy, not passively but as a major active player, endangering the future of young people.
content:encoded: From LBJ to the present, the federal government has knowingly continued to expand the US fossil economy, not passively but as a major active player, endangering the future of young people.
itunes:subtitle: From LBJ to the present, the federal government has knowingly continued to expand the US fossil economy, not passively but as a major active player, endangering the future of young people.
itunes:summary: From LBJ to the present, the federal government has knowingly continued to expand the US fossil economy, not passively but as a major active player, endangering the future of young people.
itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
